messages.subject: constant high-pitched screams
messages.msgSnippet: Cynthia! I had to laugh when I saw this expression. I would love to know what you do to discourage a screaming 3-year-old. I would not have believed without
messages.messageBody:
Cynthia! I had to laugh when I saw this expression. I would love to know
what you do to discourage a screaming 3-year-old. I would not have believed
without hearing the squeals, shrieks and glass-shattering screeches that
emanate from my little blond angel. It does, to say the least, disrupt the
tranquility of the home (the car, the library, the restaurant, the park....)
Annette
